message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find very valuable. I'm willing to let it go for $900000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that you're working with a budget, Bob, but I'm confident that this product will bring you significant returns in the long run. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $850000. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to negotiations.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more in the range of $750000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $825000. This is a unique product, and I believe it's worth every penny. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I'm counteroffering at $825000. This is my last offer before considering other options.

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but I need to be at $775000 or lower. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not giving away the farm. I'm counteroffering at $810000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but I need to be at $785000 or lower. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I'm starting to feel like we're in a bit of a stalemate, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession to try and get a deal done. I'm counteroffering at $820000. This is my absolute final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to move on to other opportunities.

I appreciate your last concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one last offer, and I'm thinking of $780000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options, including buying from John for $1000000.
